attributes.action: create a register for persons who wish to reject their infant baptism, rendering it null and void.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Infant baptism is against the will of the infant. Many may grow up to resent the fact that they were baptised, but there is no way to reverse it. Even if you state that you reject your baptism, it does not change the fact that you were baptised. This petition calls for a sort of register of de-baptism for those who were baptised into a faith as an infant to reject it if they so wish.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
